headline: GSK’s Linerixibat Poised to Address Substantial Unmet Need for the Treatment of Pruritus Associated with Primary Biliary Cholangitis, According to Spherix Global Insights
summary: Despite new market entrants in the form of Gilead’s Livdelzi and Ipsen’s Iqirvo, US gastroenterologists report nearly half of PBC patients suffer from moderate to severe pruritus, underscoring an existing unmet need.EXTON, PA, July 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The treatment landscape for primary biliary cholangitis (PBC) has undergone a marked transformation over the past year, driven by the recent approvals of Gilead’s Livdelzi (seladelpar) and Ipsen’s Iqirvo (elafibranor).
